main event: Mrs. Gunter AFB reported seeing 20-25 flying saucers over Montgomery, Alabama on June 18, 1949.
interesting points: The observer noticed the saucers while driving,The saucers were described as saucer-like and the size of dinner plates,The objects appeared to be bubbling in and out of large thunderhead clouds, The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes, The observer had never seen anything like it before despite being familiar with aircraft.
witness description: a normal mature woman, wife of an Air Force member
